p: Differently from the previous model, feature importance associated to the EOs biofilm inhibition production on RP62A strain highlighted 3-octanol, phellandral, thymol, d-limonene as chemical compounds most important on modulating biofilm reduction ( Figure 9 and Table 8). Partial dependence plots for 3-octanol, phellandral, thymol, d-limonene associated the four components as all positively able to inhibit biofilm production ( Supplementary Material Figure SM-4).
